neg review: Bed / mattress and could be cleaner the bathroom

pos review: It is very centrally located out of the central station and the city's zoo.  Other attractions are about 10-15 away if you are at a leisurely pace.  Staff are friendly and the hotel room size is okay.
neg review: No refrigerator.  Otherwise, nothing at all.

pos review: Nothing. It was hopeless except for location
neg review:
No kettle in rooms
The receptionist had no clarity on the document required while checking in
Security cameras not working
No tagging of the bags in reception.

pos review: Situated right beside the railway station this is a superbly situated hotel, especially if, like us, you are on a flying visit. No complaints at all.
Friendly and helpful staff. Very good price. 12 o clock check out.
neg review: Noisy street, old carpet, no fridge in the room.

pos review: The Reception staff were very courteous and professional. The hotel was right next to Antwerp's beautiful central station. The shower and bathroom facilities were very good.
neg review: The first room i stayed in, a standard single have poor quality furniture and mattress.  The Second room a standard double was a lot better.

pos review: You can see these rooms are suffering a lot of party's, but still its clean.
neg review: Bit small room but was clean, for the price i payed it was very ok.
